title: Dream Evil Evilized
description:
The Swedish supergroup returns with another album of mid-tempo power metal crunch, complete with a power ballad and the Dream Evil anthem, 'Made Of Metal'. Features the talents of famed producer Fredrik Nordstrom on guitar, as well as Gus ...    Full DescriptionG (Firewind, Mystic Prophecy) and Snow Shaw (Notre Dame, ex-Mercyful Fate, ex-King Diamond). Century Media. 2003.

Dream Evil: Niklas Isfeldt (vocals); Fredrik Nordstrom (guitar, keyboards); Gus G (guitar); Peter Stalfors (bass); Snowy Shaw (drums).

01) Dream Evil - Break the Chains
02) Dream Evil - By My Side
03) Dream Evil - Fight you 'Till the End
04) Dream Evil - Evilized
05) Dream Evil - Invisible
06) Dream Evil - Bad Dreams
07) Dream Evil - Forevermore
08) Dream Evil - Children of the Night
09) Dream Evil - Live a Lie
10) Dream Evil - Fear the Night
11) Dream Evil - Made of Metal
12) Dream Evil - End
